greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Symmetric square array read by antidiagonals: T(n,k) = p(n)*p(k)-p(n*k), where p(i) = prime(i), for n>=1, k>=1.
comment: Mitrinovic et al. appear to assert that T(n,k) > 0 for all n,k, but presumably they should have said T(n,k) > 0 for all n+k >= 8.
reference: D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Handbook of Number Theory, Kluwer, 1996, Section VII.18, p. 247.
link: H. Ishikawa, Über die Verteilung der Primzahlen, Sci. Rep. Tokyo Univ. Lit. Sci. Sect. A, 2 (1934), 27-40.
xref: Main diagonal of the square array is A123914.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 11 2019
